text: Velva is a city in McHenry County, North Dakota, United States. The population was 1,086 at the 2020 census. It is part of the Minot Metropolitan Statistical Area. Velva was founded in 1897 and is the birthplace of television correspondent Eric Sevareid. ==References== Category:Cities in North Dakota Category:1897 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in North Dakota
title: Velva, North Dakota
